item.title: Michelle add a quote by Hemingway, Ernest
item.description: "I drink to make other people more interesting." -- Hemingway, Ernest

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Dean Martin
item.description: "I feel sorry for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day." -- Dean Martin

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before." -- Mae West

item.title: Michelle add a quote by John Wayne
Michelle add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "You think those dogs will not be in heaven! I tell you they will be there long before any of us." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Woodrow Wilson
item.description: "If a dog will not come to you after having looked you in the face, you should go home and examine your conscience." -- Woodrow Wilson

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Geoffrey Rogers
item.description: "I run into trees all the time when I go sledding" -- Geoffrey Rogers

item.title: Michelle add a quote by John Wooden
item.description: "Be more concerned with your character than your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are." -- John Wooden

item.title: Michelle add a quote by John Wayne
item.description: "It's getting to be ri-goddamn-diculous." -- John Wayne

item.title: Michelle add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Michelle add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you." -- George R.R. Martin
